column1: 57 year old male, no known comorbidities.
Leucocytosis. Hypoxemic and hypocapnic respiratory failure.
Suspected contact with red zone subjects. NCOV positive buffer 19.
Fig. 1 and 2 In all the lung lobes are evident coarse air of increased density. In particular, the main aspect is that of ground glass areas with a tendency towards consolidation.
Fig. 3 The alterations have a predominantly subpleural arrangement, and appear more evident in the lower lobes.
